mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT session_id FROM chat_histories WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY session_id DESC

SELECT c.session_id, (SELECT content FROM chat_histories WHERE session_id = c.session_id AND user_id = #{userId} AND role = 'user' ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 1) as first_message, MAX(c.created_at) as last_time, COUNT(*) as message_count FROM chat_histories c WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.session_id ORDER BY MAX(c.created_at) DESC
